header: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy to take out 200 mln yuan loan
body: * Says it will take out a loan of 200 million yuan, with a term of 12 months, from CHINA INDUSTRIAL INTERNATIONAL TRUST LIMITED
